name: Denyse Mohan
summary: Senior Graphic Designer with 30+ years of experience in print, logo design and dimensional signs. Proven ability to lead design teams, develop branding, and deliver campaigns from concept to final rendering.
skills: Vinyl Plotters: Summa D120R, Graphtec, Ioline, HS15, FC 7500
Sign Tracking Software: Keyed IN, Pace

experience.title: Senior Graphic Designer
experience.description: Sketched designs for large home builders; adhered to branding guidelines; designed logos and interior acrylic signs with stand-off wall mounts, 3-D signs, impact logo signs, routed top signs, whip flags, mailboxes, take-one boxes, feather flags, amenity signs, site ID signs, model ID signs, banners, and more. Prepared final print files; uploaded sketches and final print file links to Keyed IN initially, then to Pace Software. Cut vinyl on FC7500 plotter.

experience.title: Senior Graphic Designer/Production Manager
experience.description: Developed creative graphics that simplified complex messages; recommended techniques and media to produce desired visual effects; adhered to corporate brand guidelines; mentored staff on customer service initiatives; spearheaded and coordinated graphic design projects from conception to completion; collaborated with clients to create vision, conceive designs, and meet tight deadlines; built relationships with vendors and outside installers to ensure project success; created and delivered persuasive sales and marketing proposals; processed estimates, price proposals and invoices; printed in-house designs and customer-prepared files on wide-format printers.

experience.title: Graphic Designer
experience.description: Designed interior and exterior signs, banners, trade show graphics, association graphics, dimensional signs, and more; vectorized and designed client logos; cut vinyl on Ioline Graphics Plotter; printed graphics on HP 5500 large-format printer.

education.school: Florida State University Panama Canal Branch
